name: Cribbage Solitaire
shortDescription: A single-player digital adaptation of the classic card game Cribbage, featuring score tracking and board customization.
fullDescription:
Cribbage Solitaire is a mobile adaptation of the traditional card game, where the player scores points by forming combinations with their cards (e.g., 15' 2) and pegs them on a virtual Cribbage board. The main menu offers comprehensive features including 'Achievements,' a 'Daily Challenge,' 'Statistics,' and a 'Tutorial'.

Key Features:

  • Classic Solitaire Gameplay: Classic Cribbage rules adapted for single-player gameplay.
  • Score Tracking: Track current, daily, and highest scores.
  • Extensive Customization: Customize 'Cards,' 'Boards' (Rare, Legendary, Epic), and 'Backgrounds' using in-game coins.
  • Monetization: Features a rewards system and in-app purchase options (e.g., 'Remove Ads').
